page.title: 17Denstone Village 2
page.content: The village hall,built in 1963,is the centre of community and social activities,being used by the Garden Guild,W.I,Senior Citizens,Cubs,Scouts, Youth Club,Play Group and the school. Dances,Parties and wedding receptions are also held there.Facilities for physical recreation are tennis courts, bowling green and a playing field. The village has the benefit of two bus services,one running between Longton and Uttoxeter and the other between Derby and Uttoxeter. DenstoneÂ£s railway was closed in 1964,but parts of the track are now incorporated into the Staffordshire Way,and cycles may be hired at Denstone to explore the route.
